title: Evan Gershkovich, recently freed by the Putin regime, has the lead byline...
content:
Evan Gershkovich, recently freed by the Putin regime, has the lead byline on a story revealing the secret Russian agency that was responsible for his arrest and is “leading the biggest campaign of internal repression since the Stalin era”.

💬 Join the discussion on kottke.org →
author: Jason Kottke
